text: Ma tebram i tlawin, u saaddant tallit nnsent, erret pent id, s lqanun, ne$ serreet asent, s lqanun. Ur tent pparat s ueeppem, a ppeccvem. Win ixedmen akka, idens iman is. Ur ppuraret s issekniyen n Oebbi. Mmektit ed ayen i kwen I$at Oebbi, akked wayen i wen d Issers si Tezmamt, akw si uuwab. Ipnabi kwen yis. Eezzbet i Oebbi. Cfut ar Oebbi Issen yal cci
